mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, displayStatus = 1, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 AND A.delStatus = 0 AND A.boardId IN (3, 4) ORDER BY A.id DESC
